content: Mississippiâ€™s entire coast at the Gulf of Mexico is declared hazardous for swimming and fishing due to toxic algae blooms exacerbated by warming gulf waters and agricultural runoff from midwestern states carried south by the Mississippi River__no.0301, 2019. #GulfofMexico #warmingwaters #climatechange #waterpollution #agriculturalrunoff #algaeblooms #hazardwarnings
